Package com.lib.pygmy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Game
    Encapsulates the game's state and levels
    GameEntity
    Represents a board game entity
    GameLevel
    Encapsulates the state of a game level, namely its configuration and its universe.
    GameRule
    Represents a game rule.
    GameUniverse
    Manages the game entities lifecycles, positioning, and overlap processing.
    OverlapProcessor  
    OverlapRulesApplier
    Handles entity overlaps and applies the appropriate rules whenever appropriate
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardType
    Enumerates available board types
    BuildConfig  
    GameMove
    Represents a move by associating the target entity with its future destination.
    OverlapProcessorImpl  
    PygmyGame
    Basic implementation of a Game
    PygmyGameContext
    Encapsulates the global state of the currently played game
    PygmyGameEntity
    Basic implementation of a GameEntity
    PygmyGameLevel
    Basic implementation of a GameLevel
    PygmyGameRule
    Abstract implementation of GameRule
    PygmyGameUniverse
    Basic implementation of GameUniverse
    PygmyOverlapRulesApplier
    Basic implementation of OverlapRulesApplier
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    Tile
    Represents a gameboard tile.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EntityType
    Enumeration of available entity types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalMoveException
    This exception is thrown whenever an illegal move is attempted
